name: DX Media Direct
description:
DX Media Direct is a direct response advertising agency. It specializes in helping companies get a measurable return on their advertising investment. We do this in four distinct ways. One - by getting 75% to 90% discounts on the media we purchase. Two - by measuring the performance of each individual campaign with a distinct tracking mechanism. Three - by refining each campaign weekly and re-investing in only the top performing outlets.
Four- By developing creative that generates customer action. We have helped small companies grow into large, thriving organizations by utilizing the power of excellent creative, effective audience impact and campaign refinement.
